data.name: SCP: Pandemic - Omni Edition Upgrade
data.detailed_description:
AFFRAY'S SCP WRITER PLEDGE



Affray will be pledging a portion of our earnings from SCP: Pandemic to SCP Wiki creators!


About the Game

Omni Edition is a way to support the development of SCP: Pandemic while gaining various in-game rewards over time for doing so! Coming soon.

Will include (over time):
  • All future story expansions (DLC) to SCP: Pandemic after Early Access concludes.
  • Cosmetic rewards for characters & weapons (very soon!).

Thank you for supporting SCP: Pandemic and keeping development independent; it means a lot to us.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains blood, gore, and bodily dismemberment. 

This game also depicts strong story themes, such as terrorism, that is advised for mature audiences only. Individuals that have experienced traumatic events are advised not to play SCP: Pandemic.
